title: Organization
description: (Second Book in Alexandra's Order Series) Her husband died; Her boyfriend moved to Asia; But neither really let go. What a Mess... ORGANIZATION continues the adventures of what seems like an ordinary life of a 42-year-old woman. The kids are growing and maturing. Business meetings require attendance. Renovations need constant monitoring. And procedures have to be taken care of. Through it all, there are incredible new lovers, new organizations, parties and Girls Night Out. And it isn't just about Alex, it's about a family that comes together to enjoy the beauty of the world. What begins with blue-collar origins turns into a blue-blood reign. It's all just a matter of organizing all the people and things around, and putting it all in order. Now that there is a rock-solid foundation, everything else is just decor. Lookin' gojus so far...
author: Emilia I. Rutigliano
